summary: In this sequel to Love Story (1970), grieving Oliver is being pressured by his in-laws to move on and take part in the family business. He meets a pretty heiress and they start dating, but memories of Jennie come rushing back.
cast: Ryan O'Neal|Candice Bergen|Nicola Pagett|Edward Binns|Benson Fong|Charles Haid|Kenneth McMillan|Ray Milland|Josef Sommer|Sully Boyar|Swoosie Kurtz|Meg Mundy|Beatrice Winde|Sol Schwade|Frank Toste|Cynthia McPherson|Gloria Irizarry|Louis Turenne|Victor Gil De LaMadrid|Deborah Rush|Ann Risley|José Torres|Miguel Loperena|Sarah Beach|Wilfredo Hernández|Dora Collazo-Levy|Herbie Braha|Peter Looney|Donald Warnock
title: Historia de Oliver
